note: Container Image Rebuild for Ansible Tower 3.4 Dependency

The ansible-tower-memcached container image has been updated for Red Hat Ansible Tower 3.4 for RHEL 7 to address security advisories:
RHSA-2019:2030
RHSA-2019:2118
RHSA-2019:2136
RHSA-2019:2197
RHSA-2019:2237
RHSA-2019:2304
RHSA-2019:4190
RHSA-2020:0227
